Title: Comply with the urban rationing system
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: The woman holds a 'Resident food supply certificate' (居民粮食供應証), the shop in the background is a grain store (粮店).This is a print from the second edition (January 1960).
Theme: Great Leap Forward (1958-1961)Iron Women, Foxy Ladies
